website_summaries.verdict: A colorful and useful wall calendar that is large but not as big as a desk calendar.
pros: Good size to write a lot of information
This 18-month academic calendar starts in July
Each month flips behind the others for easy reference
A different border pattern each month
Matte finish on paper keeps writing from smearing
cons: The boxes on this calendar are not lined, making it more challenging than some calendars to keep tidy and organized

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice on my Fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Great 2018 to 2019 academic calendar. Colorful and lots of room to fill important dates. If hanging this on your refrigerator you will need strong magnet to hold it up it’s on the heavy side . I removed the cardboard backing that was adding most of the weight.
customer_reviews.author: DorPiz

customer_reviews.title: 2019 calendar had a 2018 October sheet!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this calendar until we got to September. I flipped over to October month to write down an appt I had and I realized that the day (supposed to be Wednesday) of my appt was incorrect (it was a Tuesday on this calendar). I compare the calendar to my Phone’s and lo and behold the month of October is incorrect. The page is actually from 2018. The rest of the calendar is 2019 so I’m not sure how they just mistakenly used a 2018 sheet on this one. I’m really disappointed and considering throwing it away. It looks so stupid on my wall with my corrected dates.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Large Grid, Good Quality Paper
customer_reviews.text: We use a paper wall calendar for our shared family calendar. I ordered from a different manufacturer last year, and was disappointed in the quality of the paper - very cheap and thin. This one is lovely and thick, with good quality hanger and backing board. Will order for next year when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Heavrin

customer_reviews.title: Month of October is from 2018!!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: the 2019 October page is there, but is switched with 2018. I did not start using the calendar unsil May of this year. Still really inconvenient. Changed from 2 stars to 3. This calendar was great, love the monthly colors/designs, until I went to add things to October. The page for October is from last year, 2018! Definitely glad that I noticed now and did not plan anything important for next month based on this page. Hopefully they caught it before printing too many copies! Otherwise, the set up is nice and the boxes are a good size for adding activities and appointments.
customer_reviews.author: Jb1957

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space to write
customer_reviews.text: The calendar works great for my family. The calendar is large and each day has plenty of space to write multiple appointments. I'm very happy with the calendar
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Matte Paper Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Excellent thick matte paper calendar. Pens do not show through. Pencil is easily erased with smearing or damaging the paper. Good sized squares and the colors are nice. I will order another one for following year.
customer_reviews.author: D.D. Popcorn

customer_reviews.title: Your dates in October will be off
customer_reviews.text: Too bad the whole month of October dates are incorrect. Disappointing that I don’t have a calendar for October but overall a nice calendar. October 1, 2019 starts on a Tuesday but yet this calendar has October 1 starting on a Monday messing up the whole month
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Strong

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service -
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to keep next to my desk. Love the patterns! High quality paper and large enough to make notes. The first one I received had one month that was 2018, called customer service directly and had a new one the next day, without having to return the old one. Will buy this product every year going forward!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hargett

customer_reviews.title: 18 month wall calendar
customer_reviews.text: This is one beautiful wall calendar. It has everything a wall calendar should have. It has nice sized boxes to fit in all your important appointments and dates. This is an 18 month calendar starting with July of this year and ending Dec. 31st of next year. It is a very sturdy calendar also.
customer_reviews.author: Lainee C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Calender Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I loved this calender soooooo much, I bought it again for 2020. I have nothing bad to say about this calender. Maybe it would be nice to have new prints, but it readout doesn't matter in the scheme of things. This calender is PERFECT! I love this calender!!! I am crazy busy and need a lot of room to write daily appointments and tasks. This calender is perfect!!! I have zero complaints and will definitely buy again next year.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and spacious
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We use it to keep our schedules and important appointments where we can see them easily. Plenty of room to write two peoples schedules in each box. I can even use my washi tape and stickers to decorate. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: AmyVsings

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Getting a lot of use out of this calendar. Pages are thick, matte and easy to write on with pen, pencil or marker. No glossy glare and no bleed through of ink or marker. Plenty of room on each day to write appointments, reminders, etc..... Love the wire hanger and the different designs for each month. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Great for recording family activities
customer_reviews.text: Love this calendar, it’s exactly what I was looking for. Good quality paper stock, extra large and space to write our family activities and the color / design is very attractive. I also love the spiral hanger - easy to flip pages and hang in our kitchen
customer_reviews.author: zNickelno

customer_reviews.title: Pages are really high quality
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is fantastic. My husband likes to use highlighter for his days off, and our old calendar always bled through. This calendar has super nice smooth heavy duty card stock weight pages. No bleed through even when I use a sharpie! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Screwed up October, November, December
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and the overall design, but just went to switch over to October and realized they used 2018 instead of 2019. Thankfully this is the only month that is wrong, but c'mon...seriously? How do you mess up just one month in an entire 2019 calendar. Will not be buying this one again that's for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Love these calendars!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second year I have ordered this calendar. I love it so much. It is thick and sturdy and I can put all the activities for my family of 6 on it easily. The only thing that disappointed me was that the 2019 calendar was the exact same print on each month as the 2018 calendar. I feel they could've changed it up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and well constructed. Bought the same calendar again.
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is constructed of lovely, card stock paper. The designs are elegant and uncluttered. I hung it in my office and get regular comments on how lovely it is. If you are one who marks up a calendar, this is the one for you. The squares are generous enough and the hanging hardware is indestructible. I think this is the best wall calendar I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieOK

customer_reviews.title: October 2019 is WRONG
customer_reviews.text: Really loved the product, until I realized they printed the month of October 2019 wrong. The dates are all off. Glad I noticed, but might be an issue for most people. I am going to try to rearrange the days of the week so I can still make it work. Already wrote all over it, so doubt I'll be able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: YvM

customer_reviews.title: Colorful Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this calendar for my work station. I wanted something different than the plain office calendars. I really love the size and colorful designs but I was surprised that the month of October is for 2018 and not 2019. All the other months are fine just that one error. But, I would order this calendar again but I'll be more careful next time.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This a cute, heavy duty calendar. I have it hanging on the fridge. It is our family calendar. Has enough space to write in notes for each day. Love the monthly themes. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, full size wall calendar. I love it! I especially like that you can write on the paper. Makes it a good schedule keeper. Colors are vibrant. Couldn't ask for a better wall calendar.
customer_reviews.author: beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Colorful calendar
customer_reviews.text: Paper and decorations were great. A little bit heavier but that’s because there were 6 additional months. That was a plus
customer_reviews.author: CoCo

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality calendar
customer_reviews.text: I'm super picky about calendars and this one deserves all five stars. The paper is a thick high quality paper that keeps pens from bleeding through. It's a great size for my office wall and I love the colorful designs.
customer_reviews.author: lawmom

customer_reviews.title: Just  perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this calendar! I will use it to record birthdays, appointment, and special events. It is large with plenty of writing space for each day. I love that each page has a different décor. Just perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a busy mom and still looks nice on the wall
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to write family appointments, school events, etc. It's perfect. The paper is thick and won't run through when I write with a thick ink. This will be the calendar I purchase every year.
customer_reviews.author: ImASouthernGirl

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: Love my new calendar - looks great against the wall in my office. Easy to see when working and I can make notes if needed. Beautiful design as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lori J. Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Love this calendar
customer_reviews.text: NO only do I love the fact that its a Academic Calendar, the colors/design & large date boxes are perfect for keeping track of the daily events. Securely bound with a top spiral & a small hanging bar. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lovnAmzn

customer_reviews.title: October '19/Wrong dates!
customer_reviews.text: The month of October isnt printed on the correct dates. Luckily it is correct before and after that. I like the calendar otherwise! First time its been like this. Just a heads up to all who has 2019 to check their dates....
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Lovely wall calendar
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size, the lack of shiny paper, the designs, & the obvious quality. Don't see the need for the extra 6 months from the outgoing year! Would save on price to eliminate a third of the pages!
customer_reviews.author: Almond Joy

customer_reviews.title: The perfect calendar!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is well made, it hangs nicely on the wall, and the paper is thick enough that writing won’t bleed through. You can also use a pencil since the paper is matte!! I will definitely be a loyal customer!
customer_reviews.author: JBE

customer_reviews.title: Very nice calendar!
customer_reviews.text: I like the bright colors and size of this calendar. I bought this to go on my wall next to my desk at work. It is going to be great, it was just what I was looking for and am so happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SES

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The boxes are a tad bit smaller than I was thinking but they still are a decent size. Love all the color this calendar brings to my wall! Will definitely be ordering in the next new year.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Daily blocks great size.  Love spiral flip over for each month
customer_reviews.text: Great calendar to keep appts/events/fun stuff all in one place for whole family to see. We hang ours in the bathroom for review the night before. Sounds like an odd place but works for us.
customer_reviews.author: V. HERMANN

customer_reviews.title: Good simple calendar
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as our 2019 family calendar. Pages are thick enough that ultra fine point sharpie does not soak through. I like the large spaces for recording events.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Bright, fun, quality but...
customer_reviews.text: Love the calendar - bright colors, quality paper, fun to writ my personal notes. I was bummed it was an 18 month calendar that started back in mid 2018 rather than truly being a 2019 calendar as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Brianmc69

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 👍
customer_reviews.text: i always have a calendar up that lists important due dates for school and more. this calendar definitely is bigger than ones i have had in the past, which i like. the paper isn’t too thin. and i got the one with the patterns and there seems to be no problems. was delivered in good shape. i definitely would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It’s called a 2019 calendar but it only goes through October 2019. I paid full price for a 2018/2019 and bought it just a month ago in 2019. Why would I want part of a 2018 calendar? It should be a 2019/2020 calendar. I’m unhappy. I would have returned it, but didn’t realize the date until after I filled out a few months.
customer_reviews.author: howard salter

customer_reviews.title: Calendar
customer_reviews.text: One month was numbered wrong! I think it was October. Great paper and the right size! Calendar is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Deb 6

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Year for October
customer_reviews.text: I started transferring important dates from my 2018 calendar to my 2019 calendar. It’s slightly disappointing to get to October and have it be the wrong year! The rest of the calendar is 2019, but October is 2018. Defeats the purpose of having a calendar...
customer_reviews.author: HJL76

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what it says - large, colorful, nice on the touch calendar that can easily decorate a space on a wall anywhere in your house. For the price paid, it is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: Works better for me
customer_reviews.text: I am going to use this calendar in my classroom, near my desk, to keep track of meetings, etc. I have used desk calendars in the past, but they always get lost in everything else I have on my desk. 😬 I like that this calendar is narrow and can fit up on a wall without taking up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Angiek

customer_reviews.title: Great 18 month calendar
customer_reviews.text: 18 months worth of beautiful big display. Thick pages and great size for the wall.
customer_reviews.author: WOWlady

customer_reviews.title: Wrong dates for October
customer_reviews.text: The calendar is beautiful, but the dates from October 2018 are in this 2019 calendar. I wish I would have noticed before putting all my notes in. Update: The company’s customer service is very responsive and got me a replacement calendar.
customer_reviews.author: reviewable

customer_reviews.title: Large colorful calendar
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely but sturdy calendar. I use it for scheduling piano students. It is great to write on, much larger than the average calendar, and holds up well to a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi B

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a beautiful, high quality calendar. I am impressed with the thick paper, size of the day's squares as there is plenty of room to write, and the design/colors used. Beautiful, high quality product with a decent price. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisle Pepe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for home or office or both:) love that it is thick so your pen or marker does not bleed through and plenty of room for writing on each day
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about the family kitchen calendar. I was extremely nervous when my husband said he bought me one for Christmas. He said he got this one because of the high reviews and I agree it's worthy of them! The paper is thick & the spaces for each day are large enough to write a few major things about each day. I love the little big of design on the top of each page.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ricca

customer_reviews.title: Very nice calendar
customer_reviews.text: It lays very nicely, the paper has a good weight to it, the blocks leave a lot of room for notes.
customer_reviews.author: JPerrynut

customer_reviews.title: Thick paper, marker doesn't bleed through.
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick paper and vibrant colors. I can use a marker to write on a date and it won't bleed through. Just a little tricky to turn a page in the coil area.
customer_reviews.author: bandaid

customer_reviews.title: Nice calendar but beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this calendar in March for the 2019 year. I really liked this calendar, however buyer beware. As it is the beginning of September I am currently filling in schedules and events for September and October and I discovered the entire page for the month of October 2019 is from last year 2018 making the calendar useless for that month!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Persico

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. The pages are thick and have a matte finish so your writing won’t smear. The calendar is a little heavy, but that’s because the materials are so good.
customer_reviews.author: JLRN

customer_reviews.title: pretty and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is a nice splash of color in my office and is a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tool for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for my kitchen. I love the large blocks to write in and the metal hanger. My calendar is used heavily and I hate it when the paper holes tear!
customer_reviews.author: SC Susie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty designs, matte paper
customer_reviews.text: The designs for each month are quite nice to look at and I really appreciate the size of the blocks for each day—lots of space to use up. Also another plus is that the paper itself is matte rather than glossy, so you can write in pen or pencil rather than only in marker. The back and front covers feel a tad thin compared to others, but this one is still far preferable
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the calendar. It was delivered when promised and was just the perfect size and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Louis R. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly sized to add in multiple daily events.
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful calendar is well constructed, and sized for a family OR individual with a busy schedule!
customer_reviews.author: D. Tess

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Big boxes to write in, nice thick paper, perfect size, metal wire hangar, nice designs for each month, each month on one big page (instead of 2 pages). The Perfect Calendar!!
customer_reviews.author: g.g.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong dates!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this calendar which is beautiful and has good sized boxes for writing in. All was good until I figured out that my October 2018 dates are wrong. Now what?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wall Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and perfect size for hanging on the end of the 12" upper kitchen cabinets. Like that is a 18 month calendar also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute patterns
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good calendar to keep at my work desk for years, and I have finally found it. I don't like a desk calendar because they are too big and get messy. Many other calendars are too small. This is the perfect size, super cute and fun patterns, and hangs very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pleasing to the eye
customer_reviews.text: The calendar is beautiful- it beats other large wall calendars and provides ample space to keep track of my family of 5!
customer_reviews.author: Nia_921

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking calendar
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and stronge calendar. I like it easy to write on it even with a marker.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Plotner

customer_reviews.title: Great Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Great calendar, it is my wife's last year of teaching after 33 years. She is using the calendar to mark off each day. Love the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wade

customer_reviews.title: October has the wrong dates
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed the quality of the paper and the colorful designs. However, I just noticed that the October dates printed are for the WRONG YEAR. What am I supposed to do now? Amazon won't even entertain giving me my money back because it's been so long since I purchased. The WRONG YEAR is in October!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Hill

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is nicely made and beautiful. It doesnt feel nor look cheap unlike all the calendars I've seen at the big box stores and I love it. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: rekaca

customer_reviews.title: Large calandar
customer_reviews.text: Nice calender . The pages and squares are large and the paper is heavy. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and practical
customer_reviews.text: Large, attractive calendar, easy to write on and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Kris S.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described. Colorful and vibrant, boxes are big enough to write in.
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: I love this academic year calendar
customer_reviews.text: I love this academic year calendar. There is plenty of space to write because the page is slightly longer than typical calendars. The quality of the paper and design are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Good calendar, very pretty too
customer_reviews.text: This is a good calendar. I hung it in the kitchen so everyone can see what is planned.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Helps our elderly minds remember things.
customer_reviews.text: Liked it muchly. It’s our master calendar. We transfer our iphone calendars to it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Marino

customer_reviews.title: Large Wall Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Calendar has thick paper and nice colors. I would've liked the metal binding to be a little heftier which is why I took 1 star off. I would buy again though
customer_reviews.author: KCBurke

customer_reviews.title: Great calendar
customer_reviews.text: I love that the wall calendar has enough space for writing important reminders - birthday and anniversary info. I'm not as pleased that the colors of the calendar are exactly the same as in 2018. I thought there would have been updates to the colors and patterns for the new year. Oh well. It's still a great calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So nice big enough to write daily tasks or to do list.
customer_reviews.author: XioYara

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, cute and large boxes to fit in a large family’s activities.
customer_reviews.author: Home Chica Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: It’s big and easy to keep track of my families daily events.
customer_reviews.author: DKFarb

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing calendar! Have purchased 2 years in a row. So sturdy & ink does not leak through. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna Morales

customer_reviews.title: Not Your Average Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I like that each day rectangle is bigger than in the average calendar. The pages are think (card-stock like material) and the spring works smoothly. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: NCorral

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paper
customer_reviews.text: Large boxes, which I need for my busy schedule. Paper is thick, good quality. Floral design looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality calendar
customer_reviews.text: I really like this calendar. The paper is very high quality and the designs are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Love the large size. Nice quality cardstock paper and vivid colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Like but order because o thought it would fit inside my 12” W cabinet. Didn’t work out due to the hinges☹️
customer_reviews.author: Shimelb

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but incorrect pages.
customer_reviews.text: Great calendar, large squares, pretty graphics. However the October 2018 and October 2019 pages are interchanged. Last page should be October 2019, but it’s the 2018 page.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is a cute alternative to the plain ones and functions very well for reserving our meeting room. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CPL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar. I like to use different color sharpy pens to write appointments on the calendar and really like that the pages are thick enough that it doesn’t bleed through to the next page.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McKinley Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice calendar
customer_reviews.text: Love it big enough to write down appointments on love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great calendar for artists or doddlers. Paper is smooth and matte.
customer_reviews.author: maynard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick paper, easy to write on and does not bleed through.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Love This Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Calendar is great. Each day has plenty of room to write multiple appointments. Paper is thick. Easy to hang on the side of my kitchen cabinet. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Good calendar
customer_reviews.text: Great calendar, room to write in the date boxes, and the graphics are well done.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa0296

customer_reviews.title: 2019 wall calendar
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar! It's big enough to have room to list all the birthdays, anniversaries, and appointments. The paper is heavy so ink doesn't bleed through.
customer_reviews.author: robbylea

customer_reviews.title: great size
customer_reviews.text: for someone with poor penmanship the size of the days are perfect
customer_reviews.author: lisa macpherson

customer_reviews.title: Very colorful!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE it! Each month is a different color and design. The paper quality is strong and thick but not to thick! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy E.

customer_reviews.title: Flip pages are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Great calendar. Sturdy and cute. Love that I can hang it on the wall and flip each page on the rings instead of having to bend or tear off. The day squares are a perfect size for writing noted in. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Fedor

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar. This is my 2nd purchase- new one for the new year!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Lynn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great calendar
customer_reviews.text: Lots of space to write and cute patterns. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Love my big calendar
customer_reviews.text: It is large and a great appointment calendar for my husband and I. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Kaniss

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room to write
customer_reviews.text: Love this calendar. Second one I bought. Love the large spaces to write down my work schedule and appointments and birthdays.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dunihue

customer_reviews.title: Great calendar
customer_reviews.text: Nice big boxes to write in. Thick paper that doesn’t bleed through. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Honnichka

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: No problem with the first 9 months, but just realized October is wrong. I think they used the same calendar page as 2018 instead of redoing it for 2019. Not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Vickey

product_meta.title: 2019 Wall Calendar - 11"x17" - Colorful, Vibrant, Fun and Fashionable Monthly Calendar (Assorted Patterns)
product_meta.description: 2020-2021 Wall Calendar. View everything for the month at a glance. 1.375" x 2.25" Daily blocks provide sufficient space for important appointments and events. Major holidays are listed in the Calendar. Mini Calendars show the previous and next month's calendar on each page.
feature_bullets: START USING IMMEDIATELY: Calendar starts NOW and runs through December 2019
UNIQUE PATTERN each month provides fun and variety.
EXTRA THICK PAPER - Prevents bleed-through with markers. MATTE PAPER (not glossy).
STRONG Wire-O binding with hanging hook provides a HIGH END appearance compared to stapled calendars
1.375" x 2.25" Daily blocks provide sufficient space for important appointments and events. Major holidays are listed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars266 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
